"Lillipan Settlement Defense":
"Contact has been lost with Lillipan
settlements in the quarry area of planet
Lillipa. There's been reports that
hordes of Darkers are attacking these
villages. ARKS members are to enter the
area and ensure the safety and defense
of the Lillipan villages.

――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Fail to defend the settlement."
